name: Hierarchical JSON Viewer
description: A component that displays a collapsible hierarchical view of JSON data, such as currentUser, with a button to trigger rendering.

inputs.label: Data Source Property ID
inputs.description: The property ID of the JSON data to display (e.g., 'currentUser' for submission.data.currentUser).

outputs.label: On Node Click
outputs.description: Triggered when a collapsible node is clicked, passing the node key.

settings.label: Button Label
settings.description: The label for the button that triggers the JSON data display.
